snippet.title: Awesomenauts: Overdrive Expansion Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.awesomenauts.com - Info on the game Awesomenauts, made by RonimoGames
https://www.facebook.com/Awesomenauts & https://twitter.com/RonimoGames - Get Social!

Are you ready to kick things into Overdrive? Good, because the Awesomenauts: Overdrive expansion is here! Get it today and gain immediate access to three brand-new charaters: the time-travelling Professor M. Yoolip, the hyperbike-riding bounty hunter Chucho Krokk, and Jimmy and the LUX5000!

The Awesomenauts are GO! After conquering the console-battlefields, the Awesomenauts are now taking over the PC, Mac, and Linux! Awesomenauts Assemble! is out now for Playstation 4 and in development for Xbox One!

Awesomenauts is out on Steam! Get the game here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/204300

The game mixes 80's cartoon graphics and platforming gameplay with a deep and modern upgrade system.
